forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Rain Showers
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 2am. Mostly cloudy. Low around 48, with temperatures rising to around 50 overnight. South southeast wind around 10 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 11am. Partly sunny, with a high near 79. South southwest wind 12 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 8pm and 9pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 9pm and 11pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 2am, then showers and thunderstorms likely. Mostly cloudy. Low around 57, with temperatures rising to around 63 overnight. Southwest wind 12 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
